category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MEAccountabilityCheckEnableDatasetInContextForBOE
preference.preference_description: Determines wheather accountability check considers the In-Context datasets of referenced lines for comparison between Bill of Equipment structures. Valid values: true - The accountability check compares the In-Context datasets of referenced lines and their children. false - The accountability check does not compare the In-Context datasets of referenced lines and their children. The default value is 'true'.
